subject: [YouTrack, Updated] Issue codio-6470: After reopen current stack in stack settings, stack picker doesn't show a list
text:
Bug was updated by Mikhail Loginov in project Codio at 29 Sep 2015 08:03.
 < https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6470 >codio-6470< https://codio.myjetbrains.com/youtrack/issue/codio-6470 > After reopen current stack in stack settings, stack picker doesn't show a list Created by MakKos  
1.Open any project                                                                                                                                                                                                                  
2.Open project settings                                                                                                                                                                                                             
3.Open stack settings tab                                                                                                                                                                                                           
4.Click on current stack to see list of stacks. List is shown                                                                                                                                                                       
5.Switch to project settings tab                                                                                                                                                                                                    
6.Do 3 and 4 again. Nothing is shown                                                                                                                                                                                                
Assignee Unassigned → Mikhail Loginov 
State    Current → In Progress
